admin.description: Full access to all system features. Admin can manage backups, server, users, and configurations.

moderator.description: Moderators can manage backups, monitor server status, and use the terminal but cannot manage users.

user.description: Basic user access for starting/stopping their Minecraft server, downloading backups, and viewing server status.

guest.description: Read-only access. Guests can view backups and check server status but cannot download backups or control the server.

backup_manager.description: Role dedicated to managing backups but not controlling the Minecraft server or other users.

server_operator.description: Can control the Minecraft server but cannot manage backups or users. Includes start/stop/restart permissions.

kirill.description: Custom role with specific permissions for unique needs.
